column5: After my first fly in and purchasing my most expensive combo I got a little worried about protecting my rods After some research I bought a Plano Guide Series Tube Its been on 3 or 4 commercial flights, 5 float plane rides and a bunch of trips jammed in the box of my pickup So far I have been happyÂ  - full review here https://www.northernjacks.com/post/gear-review-plano-guide-series-rod-tube Cheers Andrew
